info.name: Inquiry Submission System
info.description:
Postman collection of all the requests implemented in this project.

Full Documentation found [here](https://interstellar-flare-856825.postman.co/workspace/38d994db-b21b-4611-a20c-4691f1075dc5/documentation/19904898-cb0ce05f-cbf6-4e61-bdd7-77a45aec8994)

request.description: This endpoint is used to login and obtain an access tokento be used to make subsequest requests
This endpoint is used to create a new user and obtain an access tokento be used to make subsequest requests
This endpoint is used to add an inquiry/question to customer support.

response.name: Make Inquiry

request.description: This endpoint is used to retrieve all the inquries sent in.

request.description: This endpoint is used to retrieve a specific inquery

response.name: Inquiries By Id
